name: Jelly Monster Hunter
description:
Jelly Monster Hunter is a Universal Game with geolocation where you have to collect as many monsters as you can around your area.
The app gets your current location when you sign up for the first time and randomly generates a few new monsters around your area, so you can walk or drive around to get closer and get them.
Once you’ve collected all monsters, the app gets your current location again and generates other monsters.

This game has a built-in Top Hunters leaderboard where you can see scores from all users around the world and where they got their Monsters.

You can edit your Identity (username and avatar image) and share your Statistics on social networks, mail or SMS.

Play with your kids like for 30 min. and see who has got the most points.
